title: Developer
description: Recent Wyncode graduate, now working as a Product Specialist for the Wix Editor. My day to day involves providing support for customer solutions within web developent and content management. I focus primarily on Full Stack Javascript including React, Node.js, & Corvid by Wix.

title: Mixologist
description: Designing cocktails in Wynwood, FL since 2015 through spirit knowledge, preparation of house-made syrups, liquor infusions, and other ingredients to create quality drinks. *BarSmarts Certified
